text:
Hey Daniel,

I actually ran into a similar problem over the weekend. And drove myself insane trying to fix it. Was convinced I'd done nothing wrong and it should be working.

I tried to duplicate existing themes, tried the boilerplate and tried building a theme from scratch. Could never get the theme to link to any images.

The same issue was happening with the fields.json, where the theme just wouldn't recognise the file.

I raised a ticket with HubSpot and turns out there was a bug affecting these things specifically. Which has since been fixed me, sometime yesterday afternoon. So this may have resolved itself for you too, by now.
huh yeah weird. I tried upload another image yesterday and it worked. I guess that was it then, thanks
